links.title: You're Dumb If You Don't Bet the Ranch on FANG Stocks During This Tech Rout
links.description: It's been a rough week for the FAANG stocks. The group has proven that, just as a rising tide lifts all ships, so too can a big fat Facebook Inc. ( FB) hurricane sink them. FANG, an acronym coined by TheStreet's founder Jim Cramer that stands for Facebook, Amazon.com Inc.
